Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/21st
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Ogden, California, Cermak and Kedzie due to, street blockage near Kedzie/21st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, Ogden, California, Cermak and Kedzie, due to street blockage near Kedzie/21st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Montrose
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Montrose due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Montrose due to a mechanical problem on a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
